org.openscience.cdk.tools

Class CDKUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openscience.cdk.tools.CDKUtilities
  • Deprecated. 
    better accomplished with SMARTS patterns or simple REGEX

    @Deprecated
public class CDKUtilities
extends Object
    Utility class written by Todd Martin, for help in his QSAR descriptors and SMILES parser. Seems to have overlap with, at least, cdk.normalize.Normalizer.

    TODO: merge with Normalizer.

    Author:
    Todd Martin
    See Also:
    Normalizer
